defaultLogLevel.description: The default logging level. Valid Values: `"DEBUG"`, `"INFO"`, `"ERROR"`, `"WARN"`, `"DISABLED"`.

disableAllLogs.description: If `true` all logs are disabled. The default is `false`.

roleArn.description: The ARN of the role that allows IoT to write to Cloudwatch logs.
